messages.title: I AM READY
messages.content: It is a privilege to be your Parliamentary Candidate for the General Election. Born in East London, and a local resident for two decades, I am not a career politician. Like many of you, I believe the established parties are no longer fit for purpose. Husband to a Spanish national, and father of dual-national children, I do not feel there is a contradiction between having a positive international outlook and wanting the UK to be free of undemocratic EU rule. I am ready and waiting to fight for the very best public services, safe streets and an economy that works for us all.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: We must control our laws, borders, money and defence.
Let's make Parliament serve the people.
Keep investing, better management, less waste.
Spend £100bn on transport and jobs in the regions.
We need a fair, firm points-based system.

issues.economy: Spend £100bn on transport and jobs in the regions.
issues.education: To end interest on student loans
issues.socialWelfare: To end homelessness with affordable housing

housing.content: To end homelessness with affordable housing
